item.title: 华尔街日报》报道：美国同意向 PG&E 提供 150 亿美元贷款
item.description: 华尔街日报》周二援引知情人士的话报道，美国将向总部位于加利福尼亚州的公用事业公司 PG&E 提供创纪录的 150 亿美元低息贷款，用于支持气候适应项目和电网升级。【原文：The United States will offer a record $15 billion low-interest loan to California-based utility PG&E to support climate resilience projects and upgrade the electrical grid, the Wall Street Journal reported on Tuesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美国银行称，投资者对美国股票的配置创历史新高，对现金的配置创历史新低
item.description: 根据博雅全球研究公司（BofA Global Research）12 月份的一项调查，投资者对美国股票的配置在本月创下了历史新高，牺牲了欧洲股票、大宗商品和现金。【原文：Investor allocations to U.S. equities has hit a record high this month, at the expense of European stocks, commodities and cash, according to a December survey from BofA Global Research.】

item.title: 美国敲定向台湾环球晶圆公司提供 4.06 亿美元芯片补贴
item.description: 美国商务部周二表示，已敲定向台湾环球晶圆公司（GlobalWafers）提供 4.06 亿美元的政府补助金，以大幅提高美国的硅晶圆产量。【原文：The U.S. Commerce Department said on Tuesday it has finalized $406 million in government grants to Taiwan's GlobalWafers to significantly increase production of silicon wafers in the United States.】

item.title: 厄瓜多尔完成 15 亿美元债务转换用于亚马逊河流域保护
item.description: 非政府组织大自然保护协会（The Nature Conservancy）周二表示，厄瓜多尔已经完成了第二次债换自然，这一次将释放 4.6 亿美元用于保护和管理亚马逊雨林的森林和湿地。【原文：Ecuador has completed its second debt-for-nature swap, this time unlocking $460 million to protect and manage the forests and wetlands of its Amazon rainforest, NGO The Nature Conservancy said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 越南全面削减行政开支引发投资者的期待与担忧
item.description: 官员和投资者表示，共产党执政的越南正计划进行数十年来最大胆的官僚改革，裁减部委、机构和广播公司，以减少瓶颈和繁文缛节，但这有可能导致短期 "瘫痪"。【原文：Communist-run Vietnam is planning its boldest bureaucratic reform in decades, slashing ministries, agencies and broadcasters in a bid to reduce bottlenecks and red tape, but risking short-term "paralysis", officials and investors said.】

item.title: 大众汽车与工会就削减成本恢复今年最后一轮谈判
item.description: 在周一进行的一轮长达 13 小时的谈判未能达成协议后，大众汽车管理层和劳工代表将于周二上午继续就该汽车制造商德国工厂的成本削减计划进行高压谈判。【原文：Volkswagen management and labour representatives will resume high pressure talks on Tuesday morning over planned cost cuts to the carmaker's German sites after a 13-hour negotiation round on Monday failed to produce an agreement.】

item.title: 瑞士政府预测明年经济增长 1.5
item.description: 瑞士政府周二预测，明年瑞士经济将增长 1.5%，略微下调了对欧洲传统上最具弹性经济体之一的展望。【原文：The Swiss economy will grow by 1.5% next year, the government forecast on Tuesday, slightly revising down its outlook for one of Europe's traditionally most resilient economies.】

item.title: 2024 年震惊澳大利亚企业界的丑闻
item.description: 澳大利亚 "四大 "银行之一的澳新银行集团（ANZ Group）的股东将于本周就即将离任的首席执行官谢恩-埃利奥特（Shayne Elliott）的薪酬进行投票表决，与此同时，该银行正因被控债券交易不当行为而接受调查。【原文：Australian 'Big-Four' bank ANZ Group's shareholders are set to vote on outgoing chief executive Shayne Elliott's pay this week, while the lender is being investigated for alleged bond-trading misconduct.】

item.title: 会议记录显示，韩国央行董事会成员认为有必要应对经济放缓问题
item.description: 根据周二公布的会议纪要，韩国货币政策委员会成员在决定于11月28日连续第二次降低利率时表示，有必要对经济放缓做出快速和先发制人的反应。【原文：South Korea's monetary policy board members said there was a need to respond quickly and preemptively to a slowing economy, as they decided to lower interest rates for a second straight meeting on Nov. 28, according to the minutes released on Tuesday.】

item.title: 巴西数字贷款公司 Nubank 向 Tyme Group 投资 1.5 亿美元
item.description: 巴西数字银行 Nubank 表示，它已向在南非和菲律宾拥有 1,500 万客户的数字银行 Tyme Group 投资了 1.5 亿美元，这笔资金将帮助 Tyme Group 为其进军东南亚市场提供资金，并在 2028 年之前上市。【原文：Brazilian digital bank Nubank said it has invested $150 million in Tyme Group, a digital bank with 15 million customers in South Africa and the Philippines, funding that will help Tyme Group finance its push into Southeast Asia and list by 2028.】

item.title: 意大利经济增长泡沫破裂，前景脆弱不堪
item.description: 由于结构性弱点再次出现，意大利经济增长从 COVID-19 大流行病中反弹的速度远远快于预期，这给欧元区第三大经济体脆弱的公共财政带来了风险。【原文：Italy's growth rebound from the COVID-19 pandemic is petering out much faster than expected as structural weaknesses resurface, raising risks for the fragile public finances of the euro zone's third largest economy.】

item.title: 阿达尼贿赂案审查中的交易是在违背官员意见的情况下批准的
item.description: 路透社查阅了 19 份州政府文件，其中许多是以前未曾报道过的，并就该交易采访了二十多位州和联邦官员，以及独立能源和法律专业人士。【原文：Reuters reviewed 19 state government documents, many of them previously unreported, and interviewed more than two dozen state and federal officials about the deal, as well as independent energy and legal professionals.】

item.title: 澳大利亚航空公司向三名前雇员支付 7,600 万美元
item.description: 澳大利亚澳航（Qantas Airways）周二表示，该公司已与运输工人工会（TWU）就向2020年被解雇的三名前地勤人员支付1.2亿澳元（约合7620万美元）赔偿金一事达成和解。【原文：Australia's Qantas Airways said on Tuesday it had reached a settlement with the Transport Workers Union (TWU) over a compensation of A$120 million ($76.20 million) to be paid to three former ground handlers who were sacked in 2020.】

item.title: 聚焦：欧洲汽车制造商为电动车打折，汽油车涨价，因为新的排放规定迫在眉睫
item.description: 欧洲汽车制造商正在提高汽油车的价格，并准备为电动车打折，以应对另一项挑战--更严格的排放规定有可能进一步缩减整个行业的利润。【原文：European automakers are raising prices of petrol cars and readying discounts on electric vehicles as they brace for yet another challenge - tougher emissions rules that threaten to further shrink profits across the struggling industry.】

item.title: 财长辞职后加拿大政府陷入困境，特朗普关税迫在眉睫
item.description: 加拿大财政部长的突然辞职使政府在距离美国新政府就职不到一个月的时间里陷入困境，而美国新政府可能会对加拿大的出口实施严厉制裁。【原文：The abrupt resignation of Canada's finance minister leaves the government adrift less a month before the inauguration of a new U.S. administration that could impose crippling sanctions on Canadian exports.】

item.title: 调查显示，超过 90% 的市场参与者预计日本央行本周将维持利率稳定
item.description: 货币市场经纪公司 Ueda Yagi Tanshi 周二进行的一项调查显示，超过 90% 的市场参与者预计日本央行将在本周的政策会议上保持利率稳定。【原文：Over 90% of market participants expect the Bank of Japan to keep interest rates steady at this week's policy meeting, a survey by money market brokerage Ueda Yagi Tanshi showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 早间竞价：投资者透过政治看央行动向
item.description: 安库尔-班纳吉（Ankur Banerjee）对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Ankur Banerjee】

item.title: 独家报道刚果在欧洲就冲突矿产对苹果公司提起刑事诉讼
item.description: 刚果政府的律师告诉路透社，刚果民主共和国已对苹果公司在法国和比利时的子公司提起刑事诉讼，指控这家科技公司在其供应链中使用冲突矿产。【原文：The Democratic Republic of Congo has filed criminal complaints against Apple subsidiaries in France and Belgium, accusing the tech firm of using conflict minerals in its supply chain, lawyers for the Congolese government told Reuters.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，中国计划在 2025 年实现创纪录的预算赤字（占 GDP 的 4
item.description: 两位知情人士称，中国领导人上周同意将明年的预算赤字占国内生产总值（GDP）的比例提高到4%，达到历史最高水平，同时保持5%左右的经济增长目标。【原文：Chinese leaders agreed last week to raise the budget deficit to 4% of gross domestic product (GDP) next year, its highest on record, while maintaining an economic growth target of around 5%, two sources with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 阿里巴巴将以 10 亿美元出售连锁商场，作为最新改革的一部分
item.description: 阿里巴巴集团周二表示，将以 74 亿元人民币（10.2 亿美元）的总收益向纺织服装企业 Youngor Fashion 出售其百货业务 Intime。【原文：Alibaba Group on Tuesday said it would sell its department store arm, Intime, to textiles and clothing enterprise Youngor Fashion for gross proceeds of 7.4 billion yuan ($1.02 billion).】

item.title: 雪佛龙澳大利亚公司与美国铝业公司签署长期天然气供应协议
item.description: 美国石油巨头雪佛龙公司的澳大利亚分公司周二表示，将在 2028 年起的 10 年间向铝生产商美国铝业公司（Alcoa）供应总计 130 千兆焦耳的天然气。【原文：U.S. oil giant Chevron's Australian unit said on Tuesday it would supply a total of 130 petajoules of gas to aluminium producer Alcoa over a 10-year period starting 2028.】

item.title: 沃尔玛与美团外卖在中国合作
item.description: 沃尔玛中国周二宣布，已与中国最大的餐饮外卖公司美团达成新的战略合作伙伴关系。【原文：Walmart China announced on Tuesday it has entered into a new strategic partnership with China's biggest food delivery company Meituan .】

item.title: 央行会议前亚洲股市漂移，美元坚挺
item.description: 周二，亚洲股市走高，美元坚挺，交易员们在为本周的一系列央行会议做准备，美国联邦储备委员会可能会降息，而日本央行暂时按兵不动。【原文：Asian stocks edged higher and the dollar held firm on Tuesday as traders braced for a slate of central banks meetings this week that is likely to see the U.S. Federal Reserve deliver a rate cut and the Bank of Japan stand pat for now.】

item.title: 官方数据显示，中国资本市场 11 月资金外流创历史新高
item.description: 根据跟踪股票和债券跨境投资的官方数据，11 月份中国资本市场出现了创纪录的 457 亿美元资金外流。【原文：China's capital markets witnessed a record outflow of $45.7 billion in November, according to official data tracking cross-border investments in stocks and bonds.】

item.title: 美联储决议公布前油价维持不变
item.description: 周二亚市早盘，油价在区间内震荡，因为投资者担心中国的需求，并等待周三美国利率决议对市场的进一步指引。【原文：Oil prices were range-bound in early Asian trading on Tuesday as investors worried about Chinese demand and awaited further market direction from a U.S. interest rate decision due on Wednesday.】

item.title: 2025 年降息押注消失，美元获得支撑
item.description: 周二，在美国预期降息前夕，美元保持坚挺，接近近期高点，交易商将长期利率假设调高。【原文：The dollar held firm and near recent peaks on Tuesday, on the eve of an expected interest rate cut in the United States, as traders ratchet long-term rate assumptions higher.】

item.title: Facebook 母公司 Meta 就剑桥分析诉讼与澳大利亚隐私监管机构达成和解
item.description: 澳大利亚隐私监管机构周二表示，Meta Platforms 已同意支付 5000 万澳元（约合 3185 万美元）的和解金，从而结束了 Facebook 母公司因剑桥分析丑闻而陷入的旷日持久、耗资巨大的法律诉讼程序。【原文：Meta Platforms has agreed to a A$50 million settlement ($31.85 million), Australia's privacy watchdog said on Tuesday, closing long-drawn, expensive legal proceedings for the Facebook parent over the Cambridge Analytica scandal.】

item.title: 消息人士称，美国将加大对中国电信美国分公司的打击力度
item.description: 一位消息人士告诉路透社，美国商务部正着手进一步打击中国电信美国分公司，因为担心该公司可能通过其美国云计算和互联网业务向中国政府提供美国数据，从而获取美国数据。【原文：The U.S. Commerce Department is moving to further crackdown on China Telecom's U.S. unit from over concerns it could exploit access to American data through their U.S. cloud and internet businesses by providing it to Beijing, a source told Reuters.】

item.title: 美国能源部确定了三个电力传输优先地区
item.description: 美国能源部周一宣布，该部已确定美国有三个地区亟需新建输电基础设施，并有资格获得未来的联邦资金支持。【原文：The U.S. Department of Energy has zeroed in on three regions of the country it has determined are in major need of new electric transmission infrastructure and eligible for future federal funding, it announced on Monday.】

item.title: 调查显示，12 月份澳大利亚消费者对经济忧心忡忡
item.description: 周二的一项调查显示，由于对经济前景的担忧超过了人们自身财务状况的改善，澳大利亚消费者情绪在12月份有所回落。【原文：Australian consumer sentiment took a step back in December as concerns about the economic outlook outweighed an improvement in people's own finances, a survey showed on Tuesday.】
